coreAttributes.authorTag: A faint inscription underneath the bottle reads 'Mixed by DSG Foodstuffs LLC'
coreAttributes.name: Grog
coreAttributes.description: A glass bottle of traditional navel grog made with rum, lemon juice, and cinnamon. The label depicts a shark-boy in a pirate costume picking his teeth with a cutlass.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A powerful wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_RESISTANCE_POISON, 3)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.05)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: After first removing the cork, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the bottle of Grog up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. A very potent smell of molasses and cinnamon rises from the opening, and as [npc.she] [npc.verb(tilt)] [npc.her] head back and [npc.verb(start)] drinking the smooth liquid, [npc.she] [npc.verb(gain)] the strangest urge to go on a long sea voyage.
